Hi!

My name is Johannes and I am a PhD candidate in the department of [Clinical Psychology and Epidemiology](https://psychologie.unibas.ch/en/faculty/centers/clinical-psychology-and-epidemiology/), and an [IT admin](https://psychologie.unibas.ch/de/fakultaet/it/), both at the [Faculty of Psychology](https://psychologie.unibas.ch/de/) at the [University of Basel](https://www.unibas.ch/en.html). In my research i combine the two by leveraging technology (machine learning, natural language processing, virtual reality, psychophysiology) to understand and improve mental health.
